name: PTL Gently Used Uniform Sale
description: <p>Blue House Conference Room=0D=0A=    Blue House Conference Room Monday, March 19at 11:00 am - Friday, March 24 at 1:30 pm.  Volunteers meet 9am on Monday for setup and sale opens at 11am. Transition easily into the winter season with Parent Teacher League uniforms! All uniforms are gently used and priced very reasonably, with sizes from K to 12th grade. Sale is by the honor system and donations of clean uniforms are gladly accepted during the sale. To volunteer or for more information, please contact Helen Rosselli, CHS parent, at 203-378-4853 or helenrosselli@gmail.com.</p>
